title: EPIC-005: Metrics - Prometheus Exporter

epic.title: Cross-Cutting Concerns - Auth, Validation, Errors, Observability, Config
epic.goal: Implement production-ready concerns: JWT auth middleware, input validation, error handling, structured logging, metrics, configuration management

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Metrics exposed at GET /metrics (no auth required for scraping)

Metrics: http_requests_total (counter, labels: endpoint, status), llm_requests_total (counter, labels: model, provider, status), llm_latency_seconds (histogram, labels: model, provider), token_usage_total (counter, labels: model, reason), active_dialogs (gauge)
Increment metrics in middleware and domain logic
Integration tests verify metrics endpoint and values
description: Expose /metrics endpoint for Prometheus: track requests/sec, token usage, LLM latency, error rates, active dialogs.
